pages.text: The Harpy Feather is a utility curio created by smithing together a feather and a Chroma Shard. It causes the user to jump into the air upon using the feather in either hand. This jump works (and is intended to be used) in midair, and has the height of a regular jump ignoring jump height bonuses.
The midair jump also resets fall damage, and when timed right can completely nullify it. If the Harpy Feather is instead equipped, it will passively reduce fall damage taken.

The Harpy Feather supports the following enchantments:$(br2)$(l)Curse of Chromatic Twisting$(): Causes the user to quickly drop to the ground instead of jumping into the air, does NOT negate fall damage, when equipped increases gravity instead of reducing fall damage
